key_drivers: 10Y TIPS real yields falling (1.698%, -2.8bps intraday) providing broad macro tailwind for gold, tech, and risk assets
VIX elevated above 20 (+7.68%) in risk-off mode, supporting safe-haven flows into gold and JPY while creating headwinds for risk assets
DXY weak at 97.70 (-0.09%) supporting commodities, EUR, and JPY; BoJ hawkish pivot (Takata calling for more hikes) and RBA hike to 3.85% reshaping FX differentials
Trump 10% global tariff in effect; trade war uncertainty elevating geopolitical risk premium across all asset classes
EIA crude inventory build of +16.0M barrels (week ending Feb 20) is a significant bearish signal for CL, offsetting geopolitical support

fallbacks_used: CNBC US10YTIP for real yields (primary FRED DFII10 confirmed same direction)
TradingEconomics attempted for HY OAS (unavailable); FRED BAMLH0A0HYM2 used at 2.94% Feb 25
